column5: AKS Someday Ill get the balls to sell this boat anchor and just take my 50 loss like a man

AKS Ive been watching buyingselling AKS for 56 years Lowest Ive seen is 185 I bought a second lot at 221 since it has shown strong support in that area I think the catalyst to pop this thing are 1 Infrastructure deal which will happen soon than later IMO 2 If we get any upgrades that will boost fundamentals are still decent and we could see at these low prices check past 3 quartersupgradedowngrade has been good catalyst for movementlast update 2 quarters ago was downgrade which got us down to these levelsStill not out of the question we near 52 week low but I see that as buying opportunity in the 12 year timeframe I mainly swing trade this but will scalp occasionally

X AKS stock price is a sentiment engine Its not going to zero and price action doesnt usually mean much regarding business performance We need sentiment narrative and the pump will ensue BOTTOM CHANNEL hereclose
